definition: وخى wakā يخي yakī (waky) to intend, purpose (هـ s.th., to do s.th.), have in mind, have in view (هـ s.th.), aim (هـ at), aspire (هـ to), be out for (هـ) II do.; to lead, guide (ه s.o.) V to intend, purpose (هـ s.th., to do s.th.), have in mind, have in view (هـ s.th.), aim (هـ at), aspire (هـ to), strive (هـ for), be out for (هـ), put one’s mind (هـ to), set one’s mind, be intent (هـ on) │ توخى طريقة to follow a method, proceed methodically, systematically; توخى غاية to pursue an object, have an aim in mind
